com.bluecreation.melodysmart

Interface MelodySmartListener


  • public interface MelodySmartListener
    Interface used to report about changes and events in the MelodySmart service.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      • onOtauAvailable

        void onOtauAvailable()
        Reports about the OTAU service being have discovered on the remote device.

      • onOtauRecovery

        void onOtauRecovery(DeviceDatabase.DeviceData deviceData)
        Reports about the OTAU bootloader being discovered. That will happen when reconnecting to a remote device which a previous OTAU previously failed on. In that case, the rest of services will usually not be available until OTAU finishes successfully.
        Parameters:
        deviceData - The device specific data that will be merged into the over-the-air upgrade image. Values in the deviceData will overwrite those in the image. If any of the values do not match the expected ones, a second OTAU will be needed in order to read the correct values from the remote device and write them on the image.

      • onReadRemoteRssi

        void onReadRemoteRssi(int rssi)
